title: Brooks Crossing Apartments - Beautiful 2 bed, 2 bath in a serene setting!
posting_body: ['-- Brooks Crossing Apartments --', 'show contact info', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1504', 'Apartment:', '2 Bedroom | 2 Bathroom', 'Square Footage:', '1043 sq ft', 'Brooks Crossing Apartments is in a fabulous location.', 'Not only are we within walking distance to public transportation , but we are only minutes from Hartsfield Jackson Airport, Clayton State University, Southern Regional Medical and numerous restaurants .', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Check out our beautiful community featuring:', '− Business Center', '− Clubhouse', '− Courtyard', '− Fitness Center', '− Picnic Areas', '− Playground', '− Property Manager on Site', '− Smoke Free', '− Sparkling Pool', '− Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '− Covered Parking', '− Fax/Copy Services', '− Laundry Facilities', '− Monthly Resident Events', '− Online Services', '− Package Service', '− Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '− Resident Referral Bonuses', '− Sports Courts', '− Tennis Court', 'Apartment features include:', '− Air Conditioning', '− Cable Ready', '− Ceiling Fans', '− Deck', '− Dishwasher', '− Disposal', '− Fireplace', '− Freezer', '− Heating', '− High Speed Internet Access', '− Range', '− Refrigerator', '− Tub/Shower', '− Vaulted Ceilings', '− Walk-In Closets', '− Washer/Dryer Hookup', '− Wi-Fi', '− Window Coverings', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', '8050 Taylor Road', 'Riverdale, GA 30274', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'D6C0C42A524340']
